thread.title: Bella Hadid Has a Nip-Slip at London Fashion Week - Bella Hadid Wardrobe Malfunction at London Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid Has a Nip-Slip at London Fashion Week - Bella Hadid Wardrobe Malfunction at London Fashion Week

author: Harper's Bazaar Staff
title: Bella Hadid Has a Nip-Slip at London Fashion Week - Bella Hadid Wardrobe Malfunction at London Fashion Week

organizations.name: london fashion week - bella hadid wardrobe malfunction

text:
Last night, Bella Hadid stepped out in a perfectly vamped-up, leather-on-leather look: a Misha Collection wrap dress, black over-the-knee boots and a cross choker necklace to add a Buffy-esque gothic touch. The ensemble fit the model well, especially since it matched her newly-dark locks, as she attended LOVE Magazine and Burberry's London Fashion Week party. But Bella seemed to struggle to keep her plunging neckline together...
Getty By the time she got in the car, the deep-V frock shifted, and she suffered a major nip-slip.
Braless Bella Hadid suffers EPIC wardrobe malfunction after LOVE Magazine LFW bash https://t.co/1SsIf33Jrx pic.twitter.com/PBJgR2Pku5
â€” Daily Mail Celebrity (@DailyMailCeleb) February 21, 2017
